reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Feedback from real customers
reviews.shareSubtitle: Tell others what you liked or what could be better.

variants.inStock: {count, plural, one {{count} item in stock} other {{count} items in stock}}

description.title: Description
description.fallback: Detailed description will be available soon.

defaults.materials: High-quality materials sourced from sustainable suppliers
careInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place

manager.noSections: No sections configured for this page yet. Create your first section.
manager.deleteConfirm: Delete this section? This action can be undone by re-creating the section.
manager.sectionNotFound: Section not found or no longer available.

linkedComponents.title: Assigned components
linkedComponents.description: The defaults for this section come from the components below. Edit them directly to adjust configuration.

modal.description: Configure the section order, translations, and per-type settings.

form.sectionEnabledDescription: Control whether this section is visible on the page
form.fieldVisibilityDescription: Control which fields are visible in the translation section
form.showHeroDescriptionDescription: Display hero description field in translations
form.title: Title
form.subtitle: Subtitle
form.heroDescriptionPlaceholder: Optional description overrides for the hero slider

configEditor.noEditorYet: No dedicated editor for this type yet. Switch to raw JSON mode.

heroSlider.fullWidthDescription: Hero slider will span the full width of the viewport.
heroSlider.containerDescription: Hero slider will stay within the main content area.
heroSlider.opacityDescription: 0% removes the overlay, 100% makes it fully solid.
heroSlider.overlayDescription: Supports hex or rgba values. Use transparency for softer overlays.
heroSlider.noSlides: No slides configured yet. Add your first slide for this locale.

featuredProducts.title: Featured products
featuredProducts.description: Products appear in the order selected. Remove and re-add to adjust ordering.

productsByCategory.title: Display categories
productsByCategory.description: Add multiple categories to display featured products by group.
productsByCategory.categoryDescription: Select category and product content display type.
productsByCategory.categoryProducts: Only products from the selected category will be displayed.
productsByCategory.selectCategoryFirst: Select category before adding specific products.
productsByCategory.automaticDisplay: Product list will be displayed automatically according to the selected strategy.
productsByCategory.selectCategoryToPreview: Select category to preview products that will be displayed.
productsByCategory.bestsellersComingSoonDescription: Best-seller rankings will be available after analytics integration.

banner.cardCountDescription: Choose how many banner cards editors can fill (maximum 4).
banner.cardBorderRadiusDescription: Applies to every banner card. Leave blank to keep the default rounding.
banner.cardGapDescription: Controls spacing inside the banner grid. Leave blank to use the default gap.
banner.cardDescription: Each card is a single image tile with an optional link.
banner.linkTypeDescription: Choose where this card should navigate.
banner.linkResourceDescription: Selecting a resource will auto-fill the storefront URL.

testimonials.sliderDescription: Display testimonials in a rotating slider
testimonials.contentDescription: Testimonial content (customer name, text, rating, photo) is configured per language in the translation panel.

cta.layoutDescription: Choose whether the CTA banner stretches edge-to-edge or stays inside the site container.
cta.borderRadiusDescription: Leave blank to keep the default rounding. Accepts any CSS border-radius value.
cta.contentDescription: CTA copy (title, description, button labels, links) is managed per language in the translation panel.

features.contentDescription: Features content (title, description, icon, images) is configured per language in the translation panel.

gallery.contentDescription: Gallery images and captions are configured per language in the translation panel.

team.contentDescription: Team member information (name, role, bio, photo, social links) is configured per language in the translation panel.

contactForm.fieldsDescription: Select which fields to include in the contact form
contactForm.name: Name
contactForm.subject: Subject
contactForm.contentDescription: Form labels, placeholders, and submission messages are configured per language in the translation panel.

video.autoplayDescription: Video will play automatically (may be blocked by browsers)
video.contentDescription: Video URL or file upload and cover image are configured per language in the translation panel.

stats.contentDescription: Statistics data (number, label, description) is configured per language in the translation panel.

brandShowcase.layoutDescription: Choose whether brands display in a responsive grid or a horizontal slider.
brandShowcase.sourceDescription: Decide how this section should pick brands.
brandShowcase.limitDescription: Maximum number of brands to fetch.
brandShowcase.limitCustomDescription: Custom lists display every selected brand regardless of the limit.
brandShowcase.autoplayDescription: Automatically scroll brands in slider mode.
brandShowcase.customBrandsDescription: Pick specific brands to highlight. They appear in the order listed below.

help.title: Help & Support
help.description: Find resources, troubleshooting guides, and ways to contact our support team.

banner.subtitle: Stay confident running day-to-day operations
banner.title: Everything you need to keep your team unblocked
banner.description: From onboarding to advanced workflows, these resources help your administrators support customers without waiting on engineering.

getting_started.title: Admin onboarding checklist
getting_started.description: Review the steps every new admin should complete to get up and running quickly.

guides.title: Guides & documentation
guides.description: Browse how-to articles that cover core workflows like publishing content, managing orders, and configuring integrations.

support_channels.title: Customer-facing support channels
support_channels.description: Update chat widgets, hotlines, and messaging apps that customers see across the storefront.

incident_playbook.title: Incident response playbook
incident_playbook.description: Follow recommended steps for communicating outages, rolling back deployments, or coordinating with engineering.

contact.title: Need extra help?
contact.description: Connect with the Quasar support team however it works best for you.

email.label: Email support
email.description: We typically reply within one business day. Please include screenshots and relevant order IDs when possible.

chat.label: Chat with us
chat.description: Reach our success team in real time during your local business hours.

docs.label: Read the documentation
docs.description: Search detailed feature guides, API references, and step-by-step tutorials.

success_manager.title: Work with your customer success manager
success_manager.description: Schedule quarterly reviews, align on adoption goals, and surface feedback directly to our product teams.

permissions.question: Who can invite new teammates?
permissions.answer: Only admins with the Manage Users permission can invite or deactivate teammates. Review permissions under Users → Roles to confirm.

support_channels.question: Where do I change the help buttons customers see?
support_channels.answer: Navigate to Support Clients to manage phone, chat, and messaging entries. Updates go live immediately across your storefront experiences.

visibility.question: How do I publish maintenance messages?
visibility.answer: Use Settings → Visibility to enable maintenance banners or coordinate with site content editors for more detailed announcements.

loyalty.title: Loyalty Management
loyalty.max_points_description: Leave empty for no maximum limit
loyalty.create_tier_description: Create a new loyalty tier with specific benefits and requirements
loyalty.edit_tier_description: Update loyalty tier requirements, appearance, and benefits
loyalty.create_reward_description: Create a new reward that customers can redeem with loyalty points
loyalty.tier_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this tier? This action cannot be undone.
loyalty.tier_not_found_description: The requested loyalty tier could not be located.
loyalty.reward_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this reward? This action cannot be undone.

validation.max_points_greater_than_min: Maximum points must be greater than minimum points
validation.remaining_exceeds_total: Remaining quantity cannot exceed total quantity
validation.end_date_after_start: End date must be after start date

loyalty.upload_image_description: Upload an image for this reward. Recommended size: 300x300px, max 5MB.
loyalty.terms_conditions_placeholder: Enter terms and conditions for this reward...
loyalty.auto_apply_description: Automatically apply this reward when conditions are met

products.title: Products
products.name: Product Name
products.slug_description: URL-friendly identifier (auto-generated from the name if left blank).
products.categories_description: Select one or more categories for this product
products.specifications_description: Define structured attributes or technical details that will be displayed on the product page.
products.specifications_empty_description: Add structured product information such as materials, dimensions, or technical details.
products.specification_help: Provide a clear label and value. Sort order controls display priority.
products.specification_label_duplicate_error: This specification label has already been added to this product.
products.searchPlaceholder: Search products by name or SKU...
products.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
products.bulk_activate_coming_soon: Bulk activate will be available soon
products.bulk_deactivate_coming_soon: Bulk deactivate will be available soon
products.bulk_delete_coming_soon: Bulk delete will be available soon
products.bulk_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} products? This action cannot be undone.

import.title: Import products from Excel
import.subtitle: Upload an Excel (.xlsx) or CSV file exported from Excel to create or update products in bulk.
import.drop_zone_hint: Drag and drop your file here or browse from your device.
import.default_status_hint: Used when the spreadsheet does not include a status column.
import.default_active_hint: Disable if you prefer to review products before publishing.
import.override_hint: If a SKU already exists, update that product instead of skipping it.
import.dry_run_hint: Validate the file, see the summary, but do not create or update products.
import.instructions_subtitle: Follow these tips to avoid common formatting issues before you upload.
import.instructions_row1: Each row represents a single product variant. Products are grouped by Product SKU or by Product Name when SKU is empty.
import.instructions_row2: Category IDs should be UUIDs separated by commas (e.g. id-1,id-2).
import.instructions_row3: Add columns like "Variant Attribute: Color" and use the attribute value or value ID for each variant.
import.instructions_row4: Excel files saved as CSV are fully supported.
import.instructions_row5: Leave optional columns blank if you do not need them.
import.summary_with_errors: Some rows could not be processed. Review the details below.
import.select_file_error: Please select a file to import.

products.create_product_description: Add a new product to your catalog with variants, pricing, and inventory details.
products.edit_product_description: Update product information, variants, pricing, and inventory details.
products.product_created_desc: The product has been created successfully.
products.product_updated_desc: The product has been updated successfully.
products.basic_info_description: Enter the basic product information and details.
products.short_description_placeholder: Short plain text shown on product cards
products.short_description_help: Use a concise sentence that will be displayed on product cards. Plain text only.
products.categorization_description: Organize your product with categories and brands.
products.tags_description: Add tags to help organize and find your products
products.featured_description: Mark this product as featured to highlight it
products.images_description: Upload images for your product. The first image will be used as the main image.
products.images_help: Upload up to 10 images (max 5MB each). First image will be the main product image.
products.variants_description: Create different variants of this product with varying attributes, prices, and inventory.
products.seo_description: Optimize your product for search engines.
products.price_description: Base selling price for this product when no variants exist.
products.sale_price_description: Optional promotional price shown to customers. Leave blank to use the regular price.
products.compare_at_price_help: Original price to show as crossed out
products.track_inventory_help: Track the stock quantity for this variant
products.stock_quantity_description: Total available stock for this product. For warehouse-specific inventory, enable warehouse quantity tracking.
products.low_stock_threshold_help: Get notified when stock falls below this number
products.allow_backorders_help: Allow customers to order when out of stock
products.active_variant_help: Make this variant available for purchase
products.variant_image_description: Upload a single image for this product variant. This image will be displayed when customers select this specific variant.
products.confirm_delete_variant: Are you sure you want to delete the variant?
products.variant_deleted_desc: The variant has been removed from the product.
products.variant_updated_desc: The variant has been updated successfully.
products.quick_variant_help: View and adjust product variants directly from the products list.
products.no_variants_message: This product does not have any variants yet.
products.quick_edit_variant_description: Update pricing, inventory, and status in a single step.
products.variant_added_desc: The variant has been added to the product.
products.variants_help: Create different versions of your product with unique attributes, pricing, and inventory.
products.no_variants_desc: Create variants to offer different options of this product.
products.variant_attributes_description: Define the attributes that differentiate this variant (e.g., Color, Size, Storage).
products.add_attributes_to_differentiate: Add attributes to differentiate this variant from others.
products.no_attributes_available: No attributes are available. Please create attributes first to define variant characteristics.
products.no_variants_matrix_desc: Use the variant matrix generator to create variants based on attributes like Color, Size, Material, etc.
products.variants_matrix_help: Create variants by selecting attributes and their values to generate a matrix of combinations.
products.select_attributes_desc: Select attributes and their values to generate variant combinations.
products.add_attributes_to_generate: Add attributes to generate variant matrix.
products.configure_variants_desc: Configure pricing, inventory, and SKUs for each variant combination.
products.enable_warehouse_quantity_description: When enabled, track inventory by warehouse instead of a single quantity.
products.single_quantity_description: Use a single quantity for this product. Enable warehouse quantity to track inventory across multiple warehouses.
products.no_warehouses_added: No warehouses added yet. Click "Add Warehouse" to start tracking inventory.
products.variants_quantity_description: Stock quantity is managed per variant. Please go to the Variants tab to set quantities for each variant.
products.warehouse_quantity_description: Stock quantity is managed by warehouse. Please go to the Inventory tab to set quantities for each warehouse.
products.no_values_available: No values available for this attribute
products.auto_update_hint: Variants update automatically when you change selections
products.select_values_to_generate: Select values for all attributes to auto-generate variants
products.variants_auto_generate_help: Variants are automatically generated from attribute combinations. First create attributes with values, then select them below to generate a matrix of all possible combinations.
products.workflow_step_1_desc: Go to Product Attributes page and create attributes (e.g., Color, Size) with their values (e.g., Red, Blue, Small, Large).
products.workflow_step_2_desc: Choose which attributes apply to this product and select the specific values you want to offer.
products.workflow_step_3_desc: Variants will be automatically generated (N×M matrix). Configure pricing and inventory for each combination.
products.create_attributes_first: You need to create product attributes first before you can generate variants. Attributes define the properties that can vary between product versions (like Color, Size, Material, etc.).
products.existing_variants_no_attributes: This product has existing variants, but no attributes are available in the system. Create attributes to manage variant combinations properly.
products.legacy_variants_desc: These variants exist but cannot be managed with the new matrix system until attributes are created and assigned.
products.variants_read_only: Variants are automatically generated from your attribute selections above. You can only edit pricing, inventory, and SKU values.
products.matrix_generator_desc: Select attributes and their values to automatically generate all possible variant combinations (N×M matrix).
products.matrix_explanation: Add attributes like Color, Size, or Material. Each combination of values will automatically create a unique variant.
products.matrix_example: Example: Color (Red, Blue) × Size (S, M, L) = 6 variants
products.configure_pricing_inventory: Configure pricing and inventory for each combination in the table below
products.matrix_readonly_desc: These variants are automatically generated from your attribute combinations. You can only configure pricing, inventory, and SKUs.
products.all_values_selected: All available values have been selected
products.media_help: Upload up to {{maxItems}} media files (max {{maxSize}}MB each). Supports {{types}}. First item will be the primary media.
products.bulk_update_applied: Bulk updates have been applied to enabled variants
products.invalid_price: Please enter a valid price (0 or greater)
products.invalid_quantity: Please enter a valid quantity (0 or greater)
products.no_bulk_values: Please enter at least one value to apply

exports.page_description: Track your export jobs and download completed files.

filters.imported_title: Filters imported from the Products page
filters.imported_description: The export will only include products matching these criteria.
filters.applied_description: The export will only include products matching these criteria.
filters.none: No filters applied. The export will include all products.

notifications.queue_success_description: We will notify you once your file is ready to download.
notifications.queue_failed_description: Please try again in a few seconds.

request.title: Request a new export
request.description: Choose the format and optional filters to queue a new export job.

queue.title: Export queue
queue.description: Monitor recent jobs and download completed files.
queue.filter_description: Narrow down the export queue by status.

table.empty: No export jobs found yet. Queue your first export above.

estimate.unavailable: Unable to estimate record count right now.
estimate.zero: No products match the selected filters.

media_upload.file_size_error: File size must be less than {{maxSize}}MB

attributes.title: Product Attributes
attributes.description: Manage product attributes and their values
attributes.name: Name
attributes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this attribute? This action cannot be undone.
attributes.noValues: No values added yet. Click "Add Value" to get started.

validation.valuesRequired: Select attributes must have at least one value

empty.title: No attributes found
empty.description: Get started by creating your first product attribute.
